body: Hi Alejandro, You should use Glare control recipe to introduce external sensor. There is a threshold that can be set in lux and not w/m2. I'm not sure where 50w/m2 comes from. You can read more here about shading controls in Daysim ([http://daysim.ning.com/page/daysim-shading-control-modes](http://daysim.ning.com/page/daysim-shading-control-modes)). I believe there is an example file for setting up advanced dynamic shading modeling with Honeybee.
